events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the engineering department based on your skills and experience.
A recruiter specializing in software engineering roles has been assigned to handle your application.
We completed the initial screening of your technical background and found it aligns well with our requirements.
Thank you for responding promptly to our initial screening questions, and we appreciate your enthusiasm.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 6th at 10 AM UTC. Please prepare accordingly.
You successfully completed the technical interview demonstrating strong problem-solving and coding skills.
Your HR interview is scheduled for May 9th at 3 PM UTC to discuss company culture and benefits.
The HR interview went well, and we appreciated your alignment with our company values.
We are excited to propose you an offer for the Software Engineer role with a competitive salary package.
Thank you for your positive feedback on the offer and for asking relevant questions about the role.
Congratulations! You have accepted our offer and we look forward to welcoming you to the engineering team.
Your onboarding process began today, including access to internal systems and welcome sessions.
The hiring process for the Software Engineer role is now closed successfully with you officially onboarded.
